name: places/ChIJU_nraWr3wokRq_cSkjeDfdo
formattedAddress: 166 W 97th St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 166 W 97th St, New York, NY 10025-6403, USA

originalText.text: LaMaternelle is a truly special place. Our son has been going there since he was 10 months old. He is happy to be dropped off every day, and we feel the relief of knowing he is safe and well cared for. Every single teacher and staff member is so loving - I truly feel that they treat my son as their own and that all staff members know him and are looking out for him. I love the activities (they have weekly soccer, and even had a petting zoo at one point) and they have an outdoor area in the back, so he gets time outside every day. I truly cannot say enough positive things about the entire staff. I am beyond grateful to be part of this community.

originalText.text: We love it here - the teachers really seem to love and care for all the kids, and my little one squeaks every time we turned the corner of the street as she knew she's heading to La Maternelle. She has grown and thrived so much since she started a few months ago. We are truly grateful about La Maternelle and all the help and support our LO has gained from here.

text.text: We love it here - the teachers really seem to love and care for all the kids, and my little one squeaks every time we turned the corner of the street as she knew she's heading to La Maternelle. She has grown and thrived so much since she started a few months ago. We are truly grateful about La Maternelle and all the help and support our LO has gained from here.

originalText.text:
Overall, the staff (from admin to teachers) were all amazing! We needed a backup care solution for my daughter as her school nearby unexpectedly closed for a couple of weeks, and La Maternelle was understanding and flexible of our situation.

The admin team worked with us quickly to get my daughter in the system. I was incredibly impressed by the weekly curriculum and activities they provide parents (the day our daughter was there was "Basketball with Coach Mike" and she LOVED it). The AM/PM snacks they provide are diverse and fun.

The classrooms and teachers were so welcoming & accommodating to my daughter. She doesn't speak any French but that didn't seem to hinder her ability to play, explore & engage with the teachers & kids. They kept me updated throughout the day on her progress, were so kind, and really made it a great experience all around.

originalText.text: La Maternelle is above all an incredible team, my son Max is growing up with caring and always smiling teachers. I couldn't dream of anything better. He evolves every day in a warm and structured environment. I highly recommend La Maternelle, and I thank the whole team for the work they do for my son.
